name: Concrete Calculator Free
description: Estimate your concrete materials quickly and accurately with Concrete Calc. Whether youre a home owner pouring a pad for a shed or a professional pouring multiple large construction projects, this app will quickly estimate your required materials, labor and cost. This full featured app includes the following features;  - manage an unlimited number of jobs each with unique estimate sheets and calculations - calculate materials and labour complete with markup and taxes for concrete and block installations - support for imperial and metric units - includes full function construction calculator and conversion app - enter multiple areas at once to create complex compound objects - calculate using several different volume sizes for nearly any shape - email results with a single button press - all values are saved on exit of app - easy number entry with calculator style keypad - supports yard, foot, inch, fractional inch, meter, centimeter, and millimeter - help text included for all aspects of application
